name: Girls Play Sport - Basketball Fundamentals
description: Prepare for Jr Warriors league with this fundamentals class. Girls ages 3-5 will review weekly dribbling, shooting and rebounding and some game play will be provided.
fullDescription: Prepare for Jr Warriors league with this fundamentals class. Girls ages 3-5 will review weekly dribbling, shooting and rebounding and some game play will be provided.
whatTheyOffer: Prepare for Jr Warriors league with this fundamentals class. Girls ages 3-5 will review weekly dribbling, shooting and rebounding and some game play will be provided.
howToGetIt: Register online or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: San Francisco Recreation and Park Department
